mapper.select: SELECT M.NAME, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT, GIVEN_DAYS, LEFT_DAYS, VACATIONCOUNT, LEAVEDAYS_YEAR FROM LEAVE_DAYS JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON( M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO) WHERE M.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND LEAVEDAYS_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')
SELECT BEGIN_DATE,END_DATE,ROUND(MOD(END_DATE - BEGIN_DATE,30)) "DAYS" ,TITLE,CONTENT, "DATE" FROM REPORT JOIN REPORT_APP R USING(REPORT_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND CREATE_BY= #{empNo}
